title: This is your museum speaking
creator_credit: Lynn Smith, David Verrall and ONF | NFB
brief_description: This short animated film tells the story of a night watchman who, with his dog, Fang, discovers that museums are not morgues, that they are very much a part of the community. With humor, the film shows how our present is connected to the past.
